message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be a great asset to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $12,500 is lower than what I'm hoping for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $13,500? This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit while giving you a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
